abstract: “60 Minutes” and “Big Brother” lifted CBS to No. 1 in the ratings on Sunday, winning the night in prime time for the seventh consecutive week.
snippet: “60 Minutes” and “Big Brother” lifted CBS to No. 1 in the ratings on Sunday, winning the night in prime time for the seventh consecutive week.
lead_paragraph: “60 Minutes” and “Big Brother” lifted CBS to No. 1 in the ratings on Sunday, winning the night in prime time for the seventh consecutive week. According to Nielsen’s estimates, “60 Minutes” easily delivered the night’s largest audience with 9.2 million viewers at 7 p.m.

headline.main: Sunday Ratings: With ’60 Minutes’ and ‘Brother,’ CBS Wins Again
